question: I am a 64 year old man and within the last couple of years been diagnosed with Type 2 Diabetes. During the last year I have been experiencing what can only be described as electric like jolts in my inner left thigh. This sensation only last for seconds but are becoming more regular. I coach a youth football team and dont know if i have strained myself  or whether I am suffering from nerve damage. Can you please help?
title: Electric like shock in inner thigh
